title: Acorn Finance and Joist Team-Up to Embed Financing Offers in Mobile Estimating and Invoicing Platform - Yahoo Finance
content: Acorn Finance and Joist Team-Up to Embed Financing Offers in Mobile Estimating and Invoicing Platform  Yahoo Finance
description: Acorn Finance, the world's first embedded lending marketplace for home improvement financing, has teamed with Joist, an EverPro solution, to embed financing offers from multiple lenders into the Joist mobile estimating and invoicing platform.
